title: Create a hello_world.py in my home directory pl...

messages.content: Create a hello_world.py in my home directory please

```python
# Creating hello_world.py in the home directory

write_file("/home/user/hello_world.py", """#!/usr/bin/env python3

def main():
    print("Hello, World!")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
""")
```

This code will create a `hello_world.py` file in the `/home/user/` directory with a simple script that prints "Hello, World!" when executed.

Execution Results:
Code executed successfully. Output:
📂 Working directory: C:\Users\seanp\AppData\Local\Temp
Created file: /home/user/hello_world.py
